parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per IDVAR, IDVARVAL, and QNAM value per subject

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SUPPQUAL.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Study identifier of the parent record(s).
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66734

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SUPPQUAL.RDOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain of the parent record(s).
datasetVariables.label: Related Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: RDOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SUPPQUAL.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Unique subject identifier of the parent record(s).
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SUPPQUAL.IDVAR

datasetVariables.description: Identifying variable in the dataset that identifies the related record(s). Examples: --SEQ, --GRPID.
datasetVariables.label: Identifying Variable
datasetVariables.name: IDVAR

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SUPPQUAL.IDVARVAL

datasetVariables.description: Value of identifying variable of the parent record(s).
datasetVariables.label: Identifying Variable Value
datasetVariables.name: IDVARVAL

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SUPPQUAL.QNAM

datasetVariables.description: The short name of the Qualifier variable, which is used as a column name in a domain view with data from the parent domain. The value in QNAM cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST" is not valid). QNAM cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. This will often be the column name in the sponsor's operational dataset.
datasetVariables.label: Qualifier Variable Name
datasetVariables.name: QNAM

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SUPPQUAL.QLABEL

datasetVariables.description: This is the long name or label associated with QNAM. The value in QLABEL cannot be longer than 40 characters. This will often be the column label in the sponsor's original dataset.
datasetVariables.label: Qualifier Variable Label
datasetVariables.name: QLABEL

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SUPPQUAL.QVAL

datasetVariables.description: Result of, response to, or value associated with QNAM. A value for this column is required; no records can be in SUPP-- with a null value for QVAL.
datasetVariables.label: Data Value
datasetVariables.name: QVAL

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SUPPQUAL.QORIG

datasetVariables.description: Since QVAL can represent a mixture of collected (on a CRF), derived, or assigned items, QORIG is used to indicate the origin of this data. Examples include "CRF", "Assigned", or "Derived". See Section 4.1.8, Origin Metadata.
datasetVariables.label: Origin
datasetVariables.name: QORIG

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SUPPQUAL.QEVAL

datasetVariables.description: Used only for results that are subjective (e.g., assigned by a person or a group). Should be null for records that contain objectively collected or derived data. Some examples include "ADJUDICATION COMMITTEE", "STATISTICIAN", "DATABASE ADMINISTRATOR", "CLINICAL COORDINATOR", etc.
datasetVariables.label: Evaluator
datasetVariables.name: QEVAL

label: Supplemental Qualifiers for [domain name]
name: SUPPQUAL
